author: Source: Bucksfreepress.co.uk
title: Louis van Gaal makes Manchester City derby favourites - Bucksfreepress.co.uk
text:
But United manager Van Gaal, who had to endure a 3,200-mile round trip to Moscow in midweek, thinks his team are underdogs for the 170th meeting between the two sides. The Dutchman said: "When you look at the facts they are first so they are favourites, I think."
 Bucksfreepress.co.uk.
